title: The Sun Pub
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, American, Indian, Western, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Vegan offerings include jacket potato with beans, side salad (w/ no dressing), sweet potato, chickpea & spinach curry with extra poppadums (instead of naan bread), vegetable samosas. Thursday is curry night. Has a huge range of alcoholic drinks. Broadcasts live news, cask marque accredited, TV screens, and free Wi-Fi.
